title: Scientists discover new type of immune cells that are essential for forming heart valves

title_detail.value: Scientists discover new type of immune cells that are essential for forming heart valves

summary: Researchers have identified for the first time the origin of an immune cell that plays a critical role in the formation of healthy heart valves. The findings could pave the way for new treatments for heart valve disorders, which can be caused by congenital defects, aging or disease.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have identified for the first time the origin of an immune cell that plays a critical role in the formation of healthy heart valves. The findings could pave the way for new treatments for heart valve disorders, which can be caused by congenital defects, aging or disease.
